sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { Toast, ToastHeader, ToastBody, Row, Col, Button, Container, Input } from 'reactstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; export default class Calculator extends Component { state = { left: "0", right: "0", operator: "-", iswaiting: false }; addDigit = (digit) =>{ console.log("Adding digit: ",digit); if(this.iswaiting){ //Right this.setState({ right: this.state.right+digit }); }else{ //Left this.setState({ left: this.state.left+digit }); } } render() { return
} }
